title: Fame, Love, and Other Lessons
description: Jamie Cameron is only a college freshman when she begins a first-love relationship with Chase Reston, the star on their school's basketball team. Within a year, Chase has been signed to an NBA team while Jamie was plucked from the obscurity of being his girlfriend to a model and media darling in her own right. The temptations surrounding them destroy their bond, and it is only when they admit that fame was just an excuse to push each other away can they slowly make their way to the love they once had.
author: Jo Frances
